name: XPOP
description: XPOP is a new hope for the Hallyu entertainment industry, and we want to achieve a metaverse world where all participants become one. XPOP wants to break away from its traditional monopoly-type structure and realize an NFT ecosystem with participant IPs, a blockchain system that benefits artists, producers, producers, and investors alike. We want to create an innovative platform ecosystem where everyone participates and becomes the owner, away from the unequal structure of the existing market.
